title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: If wishes could make your dreams come true, you wouldnt have a worry in the world. You yearn for everything to fall into place immediately, if not sooner. But alas, reality doesnt often cooperate with perfect fantasies. Progress takes time, as well you know. The wheels are in motion now, even if its nearly impossible for them to spin fast enough to satisfy you. With patience and a sense of humor, any wait seems shorter. Author Elizabeth Gilbert wrote, You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestation of your own blessings." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
